titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2500) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-141, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2500 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 53.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 192.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/16/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2500 (FY 2002 Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies appropriations).
